entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Québec
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -12.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quebec Lesage Int'l Airport 12:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -12.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -18.5°C
Wind: WNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning early in the evening. Amount possibly reaching 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. High minus 4. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
